product_name: Brooks Infiniti II Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With weather-resistant fabric and excellent reflectivity, the men's Infiniti Jacket II from Brooks keeps you plugging happily through the miles during wet weather and dim light. Windproof and water-resistant fabric with a Durable Water Repellent finish shelters you from light rain and blustery conditions. Reflective details can be seen from any angle, and pull-down reflective flaps enhance reflectivity and tuck away when you don't need the extra boost of visibility. Moisture-proof internal pocket totes your music player; 2 zippered pockets shelter hands and accessories. Stretchy underarm panels increase range of motion; cuffs with thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over tops of hand to boost warmth. Full-length front zipper offers instant ventilation, and vented back keeps air flowing. The semifitted Brooks Infiniti Jacket II is not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: With weather-resistant fabric and excellent reflectivity, the men's Infiniti Jacket II from Brooks keeps you plugging happily through the miles during wet weather and dim light.
